hero.title: Alandalus
hero.body: Sustainability is firmly embedded within Alandalus’s business model, reflecting the company's alignment with the aspirations of Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Vision 2030 and the national transition toward a more inclusive, diversified, and environmentally conscious economy. The company recognizes that long-term success is not only measured by financial growth, but by the ability to create shared value for all stakeholders—customers, investors, employees, and the broader community.
page_1.footer.title: Sustainability
page_1.footer.description: Sustainability is firmly embedded within Alandalus’s business model, reflecting the company’s alignment with the aspirations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Vision 2030 and the national transition toward a more inclusive, diversified, and environmentally conscious economy. The company recognizes that long-term success is not only measured by financial growth, but by the ability to create shared value for all stakeholders: customers, investors, employees, and the broader community.
governance.seo.title: Governance & Risk Management | Alandalus Property
governance.seo.description: Alandalus strengthens governance with robust risk management, ethics, audit & compliance, whistleblowing, and sustainable procurement—aligned with Vision 2030.
governance.hero.title: Governance & Risk Management
governance.hero.p1: In 2024, Alandalus Property Company reinforced its governance framework by strengthening risk management, compliance, and ethical practices across operations. The Company conducted a comprehensive assessment of corruption risks, maintained a zero-tolerance approach to bribery, and implemented internal and external audit mechanisms. Policies and training covered anti-bribery, anti-money laundering, and whistleblowing with confidential channels for reporting concerns.
governance.hero.p2: Governance also extended to human resources and inclusion, promoting equal pay, a safe work environment, and fair labor practices. Environmental governance integrated policies on energy, water, and waste. Sustainable procurement advanced with 30% aligned to sustainability criteria and 86% sourced locally—demonstrating accountability, transparency, and responsible management.

governance.subtitle: The structure of the Board of Directors at Alandalus Property is designed to ensure effective oversight, strategic guidance, and sound decision-making, in alignment with corporate governance best practices.

governance.strategy.title: Governance Highlights
governance.strategy.description: Through these initiatives, Alandalus Property demonstrates a long-term focus on upholding the highest standards of corporate governance, ethical conduct, and regulatory compliance. By embedding sustainability and risk management into its governance framework, the Company ensures operational integrity, stakeholder trust, and long-term resilience. These efforts increase the Company’s ability to drive responsible growth while fostering a culture of transparency, accountability, and sustainability across its operations.

governance.footer.title: Corporate Governance
governance.footer.description: Our approach to corporate governance is built on transparency, accountability, and ethical leadership. We maintain a clear governance framework that ensures decision-making aligns with stakeholder interests and long-term sustainability goals.
sustainability.social.body: Alandalus property is committed to creating a positive impact beyond its commercial operations by actively supporting initiatives that benefit the wider community. Through health awareness campaigns, educational programs, charitable partnerships, and inclusive activities, the company transforms its malls into hubs for social engagement and public well-being. This approach reflects Alandalus property’s dedication to fostering a culture of care, sustainability, and shared value creation.
social.mission.title: Mission & Values
social.human.title: Human Capital and Community Engagement.
social.human.p1: In 2024, Alandalus Property Company further advanced its social performance by prioritizing the development, well-being, and engagement of its workforce while fostering a culture of inclusivity and shared responsibility. Strategic efforts focused on enhancing workforce diversity, promoting gender balance, and strengthening Saudization initiatives, ensuring that talent development aligns with both organizational growth and national objectives.
social.human.p2: Comprehensive training and development programs, totaling over 1,000 hours, empowered employees to enhance their skills and advance professionally, while structured performance appraisals reinforced a merit-based culture. Employee well-being was supported through health campaigns, robust benefits, and initiatives aimed at creating a safe, supportive, and motivating work environment. Beyond internal initiatives, the Company actively contributed to the broader community, implementing programs that reflect its commitment to social responsibility and sustainable development.
social.highlights.title: Social Highlights
social.highlights.p1: These initiatives reflect Alandalus Property’s sustained focus on cultivating a resilient, inclusive, and high-performing workforce while driving meaningful social impact. By continuously monitoring, evaluating, and enhancing its social practices, the Company ensures not only the personal and professional growth of its employees but also the creation of lasting value for stakeholders and the communities it serves. Through these efforts, Alandalus Property demonstrates that strong social performance is integral to its broader sustainability objectives and long-term organizational success.
social.cards.employees.title: Employees
social.cards.new_hires.title: New Hires

social.cards.health.title: Health Campaigns
social.cards.community_programs.title: Community Engagement Programs
social.community.title: Community Wellbeing Initiatives
social.community.lead: Alandalus property’s commercial malls continue to serve as platforms for positive social engagement, reflecting a strong sense of responsibility toward community well-being. These spaces are consistently utilized to host a wide range of awareness, health, and educational campaigns. Many of these initiatives are now recurring programs, delivered in collaboration with government agencies, universities, and health organizations.
social.community.list_title: Ongoing Community Campaigns Hosted At Our Malls Include:
social.community.items.polio: Polio vaccination campaign with the Ministry of Health, contributing to national immunization efforts.
social.community.items.diabetes: Diabetes awareness campaign with King Abdulaziz University, promoting healthy lifestyle practices.
social.community.items.women_health: Women’s health campaign with Life Doctors, focusing on early detection and preventive care.
social.community.items.breast_cancer: Annual breast cancer awareness event with the Ministry of Health, aligned with the international day for early detection.
social.community.items.skin_cancer: Skin cancer education drive with King Abdulaziz University, emphasizing prevention and early screening.
social.community.items.drug_abuse: Drug abuse awareness campaign with youth associations, targeting young people and families.
social.community.items.dental: Oral and dental health campaign with the Saudi Dental Association, offering educational sessions and basic checkups.
social.community.items.med_safety: “Dawaa’ak” medication safety awareness campaign, promoting safe usage practices.
social.community.items.epilepsy: Epilepsy awareness campaign with King Saud University, reducing stigma and increasing public understanding.
social.community.items.asthma: Asthma prevention program with King Saud University, held on the international day for asthma.
social.community.items.joint_pain: Joint pain awareness event with local clinics, offering preventative insights and consultations.
social.community.items.liver_health: Liver health campaign with King Saud University, on the international day for fatty liver awareness.
social.community.items.hernia: Hernia awareness drive with university hospitals, educating on symptoms and treatment.
social.outreach.title: Social Outreach
social.outreach.lead: In addition to Alandalus Property’s sustained efforts in health awareness, the Company remains actively involved in a wide range of community enrichment initiatives. These efforts extend to educational, humanitarian, and recreational activities that improve public well-being and strengthen the social fabric across its mall properties. Alandalus Property’s strategy centers on making its commercial centers accessible platforms for social value creation
social.outreach.items.sleep_day: World Sleep Day awareness booth with Nafa Charity Association, Enan Al-Ataa Volunteer Team, and the Ministry of Health.
social.outreach.items.drug_session: Drug and substance abuse awareness session led by the General Trainer for Drug Control in the Makkah Region.
social.outreach.items.flu_vaccine: Seasonal influenza vaccination campaign by King Abdulaziz Hospital.
social.outreach.items.clothing_recycle: Clothing recycling initiative with Aoun Charity and Ghaith Charity Project.
social.outreach.items.sanad: “Sanad” campaign organized by King Saud bin Abdulaziz University for Health Sciences.
social.resp.title: Social Responsibility
social.resp.lead: Alandalus Property is committed to creating a positive impact beyond its commercial operations by actively supporting initiatives that benefit the wider community. Through health awareness campaigns, educational programs, charitable partnerships, and inclusive activities, the Company transforms its malls into hubs for social engagement and public well-being. This approach reflects Alandalus Property’s dedication to fostering a culture of care, sustainability, and shared value creation.
home.hero.title: Alandalus
home.hero.body: Sustainability is firmly embedded within Alandalus’s business model, reflecting the Company’s alignment with the aspirations of Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Vision 2030 and the national transition toward a more inclusive, diversified, and environmentally conscious economy. The Company recognizes that long-term success is not only measured by financial growth, but by the ability to create shared value for all stakeholders, customers, investors, employees, and the broader community.
home.about.title: About This Report
home.about.description: Alandalus Sustainability Report outlines the Company’s 2024 progress in embedding sustainable practices across its operations, with a focus on environmental responsibility, social contribution, and economic resilience. Covering all operations in Saudi Arabia from January 1 to December 31, 2024, the report demonstrates Alandalus’s commitment to transparency, stakeholder engagement, and alignment with global and national frameworks, including the GRI Standards (2021), UN SDGs, and Saudi Vision 2030. Verified data from internal and public sources, supported by external consultancy, ensures accuracy while ongoing stakeholder engagement with employees, customers, investors, and communities increases trust and strengthens sustainability reporting.
home.about.cards.scope.title: Scope and Boundaries
home.about.cards.scope.body: Full-year 2024 coverage; all operations across Saudi Arabia; issued annually.
home.about.cards.standards.title: Reporting Standards
home.about.cards.standards.body: Prepared according to GRI 2021; aligned with UN SDGs and Saudi Vision 2030.
home.about.cards.data.title: Data Collection & Verification
home.about.cards.data.body: Data drawn from internal and public sources; verified by external consultancy.
home.about.cards.stakeholders.title: Stakeholder Engagement
home.about.cards.stakeholders.body: Active engagement with employees, customers, partners, investors, and communities to enhance transparency and reporting quality.
home.timeline.title: Sustainability Pillars Timeline
home.timeline.section1.title: Environment
home.timeline.section1.point1: Reduce environmental impact through sustainable practices in biodiversity, water, and waste management.
home.timeline.section1.point2: Reduce energy consumption for all facilities.
home.timeline.section2.title: Economic Contribution
home.timeline.section2.point: Contribute to strengthening Saudi Arabia’s economic growth, labor market, and community development.
home.timeline.section3.title: Diversity & Development
home.timeline.section3.point1: Encourage and lead diversity and employee development regionally.
home.timeline.section3.point2: Promote female representation in higher positions and board membership.
home.timeline.section4.title: Health, Safety, & Security
home.timeline.section4.point1: Ensure a strong HSE system for all employees and visitors.
home.timeline.section4.point2: Promote a healthy lifestyle and encourage the local community.
home.timeline.section5.title: Business Sustainability
home.timeline.section5.point1: Ensure corporate operations and governance are implemented, transparent, and compliant.
home.timeline.section5.point2: Incorporate risk management into all business activities and planning.
home.strategy.title: Sustainability Strategy
home.strategy.p1: Sustainability is at the core of Alandalus’s business model, aligning closely with Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 and the national transformation toward a more inclusive, diversified, and environmentally responsible economy. For Alandalus, long-term success goes beyond financial performance; it is equally about creating shared value for stakeholders, customers, investors, employees, and the wider community. The Company’s Sustainability Strategy provides a clear and actionable roadmap to embed sustainability across all operations. It ensures that economic growth
home.strategy.p2: is advanced alongside social contribution and environmental responsibility, with sustainability integrated into governance, decision-making, and performance monitoring. Building on its strengths in real estate development, asset management, and community engagement, Alandalus works closely with shareholders, employees, and partners to identify opportunities that reduce environmental impact, foster inclusive growth, and strengthen community connections. Through this approach, the Company is shaping a resilient and responsible business model that supports both national priorities and global sustainability goals.
home.strategy.goals.goal1: Creating a welcoming environment for the local community
home.strategy.goals.goal2: Mitigate our impact on the environment
home.strategy.goals.goal4: Promote Saudization, equality, diversity, and inclusion
home.timeline.section6.title1: Creating a welcoming environment for the local community
home.timeline.section6.title2: Mitigate Our Impact on the Environment
home.timeline.section6.title4: Promote Saudization, Equality, Diversity, and Inclusion (sdgs 5,10)
home.material.p1.part2: Assessment to identify and prioritize the
home.material.p1.part3: most significant to its business model and stakeholders. The process combined peer benchmarking, stakeholder feedback, and internal consultations to ensure a balanced and future-oriented perspective.
home.material.p2.part1: The results highlighted a set of material topics that hold the greatest relevance for
home.material.p2.part2: operations. By engaging closely with stakeholders, the Company aligned its sustainability priorities with stakeholder expectations, strengthening its ability to anticipate risks, address emerging
environment.hero.title: Environmental Responsibility
environment.hero.body: In 2024, Alandalus property company further enhanced its environmental performance through targeted initiatives aimed at reducing resource consumption, minimizing environmental impact, and promoting sustainable practices across its operations. Significant efforts were made to enhance energy efficiency, achieving approximately a 10% reduction in overall energy use, while implementing sustainable upgrades such as LEED-certified flooring and thermal insulation to further optimize building performance.
environment.hero.img_alt: Sustainability hero image illustrating Alandalus’s environmental commitment
env.timeline.title: Environmental Highlights
env.timeline.description: Through these comprehensive environmental measures, Alandalus Property highlights its commitment to responsible resource management, emission reduction, and sustainable operations. By continuously improving energy and water efficiency, advancing circular economy practices, and integrating sustainability into operational planning, the Company not only minimizes its environmental impact but also contributes to national and global sustainability objectives. These efforts promote Alandalus Property’s role as a leader in environmentally responsible property management and support its long-term vision for a greener, more sustainable future.

env.energy_.title: Energy Performance in 2024
env.energy_.description: In 2024, Alandalus Property achieved the following electricity consumption levels across its major assets.
env.energy.title: Energy Efficiency
env.energy.description: Alandalus Property continues to address its energy consumption by implementing a targeted strategy to reduce electricity use across its properties. Throughout 2024, the Group focused on improving operational efficiency, upgrading systems, and integrating sustainable materials to reduce its energy footprint and support the national transition toward low-carbon development.
env.energy.performance_sub: In 2024, Alandalus Property achieved the following electricity consumption
env.energy.assets.hayat.title: Hayat Mall
env.energy.assets.hotel.title: Alandalus Hotel

env.led.title: LED Lighting Upgrades
env.led.intro: All conventional lighting fixtures, both interior and exterior, were replaced with high-efficiency units. This retrofit achieved an estimated 10% reduction in electricity consumption across both malls. Total electricity consumption via lighting fixtures and automation in 2024:
env.led.card1.title: LED Lighting Upgrades
env.led.card1.body: All conventional lighting fixtures, both interior and exterior, were replaced with high-efficiency units; this retrofit achieved an estimated 10% reduction in electricity consumption across both malls.
env.led.card1.total_title: Total Electricity Consumption Via Lighting Fixtures And Automation In 2024:
env.hvac.card2.title: HVAC System Renewal
env.hvac.card2.body: Existing air-conditioning units were replaced with high-efficiency systems that improve cooling distribution while reducing energy usage by ~10%. These upgrades enhance visitor comfort while supporting operational sustainability.
env.hvac.card2.total_title: Total Electricity Consumption Via HVAC In 2024:
env.water.title: Water Management
env.water.body: Reducing water consumption is a priority for Alandalus, particularly given the growing national and global concerns around natural resource scarcity. As water plays the most significant role in supporting daily life, economic activity, and environmental sustainability, the group continues to implement practical solutions that minimize unnecessary usage across its properties. To curb excess consumption, sensor-based water taps have been installed throughout all malls and facilities; these automated systems ensure that only the required amount of water is dispensed, reducing wastage by up to 60%.
env.circular.title: Circular Economy
env.circular.p1: Recycling is significant for reducing the environmental impact of waste by conserving natural resources, lowering energy use, and limiting the amount of waste sent to landfills. At Alandalus Property, recycling is an ongoing practice embedded in day-to-day operations across all commercial centers. Dedicated collection points are maintained to ensure proper sorting and transfer of recyclable materials to approved facilities, with a strong focus on reducing cardboard waste generated by tenants and customers alike.
env.circular.p2: In parallel with recycling efforts, Alandalus Property closely monitors the consumption of materials, particularly paper, to identify reduction opportunities and promote more responsible resource use. Tracking consumption volumes across commercial centers provides insight into operational efficiency and supports broader sustainability goals aimed at minimizing environmental footprint. In 2024, the volume of paper usage in KG
env.footer.hero.title: Environmental Responsibility
env.footer.hero.body: In 2024, Alandalus Property Company further enhanced its environmental performance through targeted initiatives aimed at reducing resource consumption, minimizing environmental impact, and promoting sustainable practices across its operations. Significant efforts were made to enhance energy efficiency, achieving approximately a 10% reduction in overall energy use, while implementing sustainable upgrades such as LEED-certified flooring and thermal insulation to further optimize building performance.
